<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> On server machine, returns the [[Multiplayer_Scripting#Machine_network_ID | machine network ID]] of the client to which the object is [[local]]. Otherwise returns 0. For use on clients [[clientOwner]] command is available. To find out the owner of a [[Group]], use [[groupOwner]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''owner''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_clientID = [[owner]] _someobject;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[publicVariableClient]], [[setOwner]], [[setGroupOwner]], [[groupOwner]], [[flagOwner]], [[onPlayerConnected]], [[didJIPOwner]], [[local]], [[admin]], [[remoteExecutedOwner]]
</value></part></template>
